attributes.action: Higher taxes for the super rich. Don't allow people to have 3rd homes or more.
attributes.additional_details: Because there are no homes available because all the rich people are buying them and letting them out. The rich get away with allot of money that is not disclosed to the tax office. And it's a joke for any normal person to even get a house at a decent price because they are all holiday lets etc.
attributes.background: The rich people should be taxed more than a normal standard working citizen. The people that have second homes or more that are letting them out as holiday homes or air B&B etc should not be allowed to have freedom on how many second homes they have.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to rules regarding people on high incomes, or owning multiple properties, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Your petition title refers to higher taxes, but it's not clear what taxes you want to be increased, or by how much.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
